rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Open space with a vestibule that allows natural light and a grand entrance experience.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to incorporate abundant natural light. Designed in Brutalist style with exposed concrete structures and raw finishes.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Functional dining space adjacent to the living room, offering ample seating and a view of the garden.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with large windows for natural light, efficient layout and integrated storage solutions. Aligns with Vastu principles by keeping proper east or north facing orientation for cooking areas.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Private guest room with a small balcony, ensuring privacy while incorporating floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Guest)
rooms.description: Well-appointed bathroom for guest convenience, designed in the Brutalist style.
